title: Context content leaks to stdout during iteration
description:
The full context_content variable is being printed to stdout during Ralph iterations, showing 'context_content=# Base Context...' with escaped newlines.

This is cosmetic - Ralph still works - but clutters the output.

Likely cause: Shell trace or debug output during context building/passing to Claude CLI.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Find where context_content is being echoed/printed
Add setopt noxtrace to context building section if needed
Verify context is passed silently to Claude CLI
Test: ralph iteration shows no context_content= output
Commit: fix: BUG-025 suppress context debug output
